message: Baby-sitters Club and Sweet Valley High :P

I didn't love SVH like I worshiped BSC but I feel like I have to read this. Also, these bitches were one of the catalysts as to why I thought I was fat as a child (perfect size 6 anyone?) by the way, they're "perfect size 0" in the reboots of the titles.
Ah-ha! That's how you add an image.

http://www.amazon.com/Sweet-Valley-Confidential-Years-Later/dp/0312667574/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1300823207&sr=8-1

I'm going to buy this next week for the Kindle and I feel like I need to go to confession. The preview chapter was hysterical. Elizabeth Wakefield gets it on with her loser boss and lives in a crappy NYC apartment. Whatever will happen next? Amnesia? STD? Pregnancy scare?
I read a little SVH, but not enough to remember who anyone was. This still seems like it will be a fun time, though.
ok now I feel like an idiot what do BSC and SVH stand for?
I think I liked to live vicariously through them.
of course they're perfect size 0s, I was more of a nancy drew and a wrinkle in time gal myself
I was so totally unpopular that reading those books just depressed me
